2022.title: What’s a hackathon?
2022.content: An event that brings together people from all fields in life - a hackathon is your platform to identify problems and offer unique solutions. Usually within a limited time period of 24-48 hours.

2022.title: Do I have to be a developer/tech person to apply?
2022.content: Nope! It doesn’t matter where you work, if you work, what you do, or who you are. If you’re someone who loves innovating, hackout is for you.

2022.title: How much do I have to pay to participate?
2022.content: Nothing. Nada. Nuh-uh. Participating in Hackout is absolutely free!

2022.title: How many people can I have in a team?
2022.content: A maximum of 4. Pro tip: Get people from different fields!

2022.title: What if I don’t have a team?
2022.content: while you can apply individually, Hackout is strictly a team competition. We’ll be organizing formation and ideation events geared towards helping you find people to work with.

2022.title: Can I attend speaker sessions and/or workshops without participating?
2022.content: Yesss! These sessions will be open to anyone and everyone who’s interested. More details soon.
